A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I agree with Mark Hammil.  \"I fundamentally disagree with the direction they took Luke.\"  The Finn/Rose side quest could be completely removed with zero story impact.  The huge build up from the last movie was wasted.  Total lack of character depth.  It was a funny movie\, and if it WASN'T A STAR WARS MOVIE\, it would have been great.  However\, it was.. and they just pissed all over star wars with obviously a vision that's trying to sell toys and extend a franchise.
